data.title: Oscarsborg Fortress Museum (Drøbak)
data.meta_description: Oscarsborg Fortress Museum is a museum in Drøbak. View visitor information, information about the collection and read reviews.
data.text:
Oscarsborg Fortress, located in the Oslofjord, played a significant role in securing the access to the Norwegian capital, Oslo, from the open sea. This strategic location made it a crucial point of defense in the past, and today, it offers visitors a unique insight into the history and military strategy of the region.

Oscarsborg as a Fortress Museum

Today, Oscarsborg serves as a fortress museum, offering visitors a chance to explore its rich history and military heritage. The museum showcases various exhibits that provide a deeper understanding of the fortress's role in the past and its significance in Norwegian history.
